import React from 'react'; import { Search, Plus, Eye, Edit, Mail } from 'lucide-react'; import { formatCurrency } from '../../Utility/formatters'; import { getCreditStatusColor } from '../utils/styleHelpers'; const APOverviewTab = ({ filters, setFilters, filteredCustomers, setSelectedCustomer, setShowInvoiceForm }) => { return (
{/* Filters */}
{/* Search */}
setFilters({ ...filters, searchTerm: e.target.value })} className="pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* From Date */}
setFilters({ ...filters, dateFrom: e.target.value })} className="px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* To Date */}
setFilters({ ...filters, dateTo: e.target.value })} className="px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* Status */} {/* New Invoice */} {/* Clear Dates Button */} {(filters.dateFrom || filters.dateTo) && ( )}
{/* Customer List Table */}
{filteredCustomers.map((customer) => ( ))}
Customer Credit Limit Balance Overdue Credit Status Last Payment Actions
{customer.name}
{customer.id}
{customer.email}
{formatCurrency(customer.creditLimit)}
{formatCurrency(customer.totalOwed)}
{customer.invoiceCount} invoices
{customer.overdueAmount > 0 ? ( {formatCurrency(customer.overdueAmount)} ) : ( $0.00 )} {customer.creditStatus.replace('_', ' ')} {customer.lastPayment}
); }; export default APOverviewTab;
